full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### PR1475 - Electric Walkie Stacker
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Reference Number:** WS3366373216-Doc3743382945
**Solicitation Number:** WS3366373216
**Publication Date:** November 9, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST (amended)

**Background:**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires one (1) Electric Walkie Stacker and ancillary items to be delivered in Quebec by February 2023.

**Specifications:**

* UNSPSC: 24102100 (Warehousing Equipment and Supplies)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Deliverables:**

* One (1) Electric Walkie Stacker
* Ancillary items to meet the needs of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans

**Timeline:**

* Tender submission deadline: November 29, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: July 21, 2023

**Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* End User Entity Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Annie Therien (SPAC/PSPC), annie.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Debriefing:**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. The debriefing should be made within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

Note: The original announcement has been corrected to reflect the accurate tender closing date and time. All bids submitted after the designated time will be declared non-responsive. Ensure all required supporting documentation and bid submission are received by the deadline.  palavraPokharaPokharaWarPure ofureetIt appears that the rewritten
